mapper.insert: insert into qna (qna_id, game_id, nickname, title, content, is_secret, answer) values(#{qnaId}, #{gameId}, #{nickname}, #{title}, #{content}, #{isSecret}, #{answer})
mapper.update: update qna set qna_id=#{qnaId}, game_id=#{gameId}, nickname=#{nickname}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, is_secret=#{isSecret}, answer=#{answer} where qna_id=#{qnaId}
